评论详情: Felt like all my belongings were safe while traveling in Europe. Easy to access when needed something from inside!

I love the colors. Matter of fact I bought 4 of them in different colors. When I first got them I thought that they were awkward. the large oval bottom made no sense as when you sit it down it is so long that it slumps. I could see how they are more beneficial as BOOK BAGS due to the bottom of the bag. But the more I used it - it works for me as a backpack/purse as well. I keep my keys in 1 of the 2 front zipper pockets. This way I do not have to dig in the deep part to find them. The inside has NO compartments. It is just open. So I have a large wallet I keep in there. If you have a makeup bag that you put a brush in, then you are all set. You could put Ipads, smaller laptops, etc but it does not provide support for it. I can see how this could be a great teen bookbag or an overnight bag for clothes, etc. But it DOES work as a backpack/purse if you organize your items well in carrying containers within the backpack.
I have this bag in a different style from another brand, but I was very happy with this one. It's sturdy quality material and beautiful color. Will by again

评论概述: Well made, beautiful and wears nicely.
评论详情: I love this bag. I have 3 of them now. I swap them out and enjoy using them.

Liked color and functionality

评论概述: Great color, perfect size, easy access
评论详情: I’ve tried so many backpacks! This one suits me perfectly - material, style, space, size.  The material isn’t too stiff and formal and contours well as needed. The dark multicolor is interesting, stylish and different without being too much and goes with anything.  The size suits my body (5’4” and slim but I’ve had back surgery so need a backpack rather than a purse) and the straps don’t slip off like some leather ones and it’s neither too small that it looks silly or so big that it’s bulky.  It’s more spacious than I expected. I can carry my wallet, sunglasses, reading glasses, book, small notebook, lipstick, tissues and a 3 item lunch and water bottle in it.  I’m really particular about my backpack and was willing to spend far more and tried many more more expensive ones and can’t believe I got so lucky with this one.
Great colors great pockets durable. Lightweight and versatile.
I love the pattern and how well made it is. So roomy too!
Item is not too small that it cannot carry necessary items but not big enough for overpacking items.
This little backpack/purse is perfect to carry things to work when I want to be able to use both my hands in the snow and ice.
perfect to hid your nice things like camera from pickpocketing since the zipper is in the back of the back that is safe on your back area; and it is nice size and waterproof and pretty

Perfect size to carry around while shopping. Waterproof, sturdy, adjustable straps. Wish it had pockets on the inside, but it carries everything you’d need for a short trip around town. Totally cute too!
Good design.  Nice range of colors.

评论概述: Love it, but the inside pocket is rubbish
评论详情: I bought this backpack because I wanted something with a Hawaiian look for vacation.  I absolutely love the bag, and I decided to continue to use it daily.  I have slopey shoulders, so I prefer using a small backpack as a purse. Having the zipper to the large cavity facing my back greatly reduces my anxiety about theft.  Now if somebody bumps my bag at the store or in line, I know if they try to pick pocket me, all they're getting is nail clippers or tissues out of the front facing pockets. I haven't been out in a downpour, but my belongs stay dry in regular rain. The straps are comfortable. It's quite larger than I thought it would be on the inside and the exterior material is of good quality. I have had several compliments on the bag as well.  The only thing I don't like is the inside pocket zipper broke after just 2 weeks. I kept using the pocket, and it started to pull away and fray down the sides. Sometimes the little frayed bits would stick out through the zipper which is unsightly.  I love the purse, and I would definitely buy another one, though. Next time, as soon as the zipper breaks on that inside pocket, I'm just going to immediately cut the whole pocket out.

I originally bought this backpack in red and I loved it so much that I bought a 2nd one with the dark circle pattern. The backpack looks so fancy and much more expensive than it was. It's great for when I'm out and want to carry more than fits in my tiny purse but don't want to worry about someone pickpocketing me.  It's not huge - it's clearly a smaller backpack. 评论概述: Love it!Came better than I expected!
评论详情: Came fast.Prettier than the pictures.Better quality than I expected.Very pretty pictures.I got the hummingbirds. Handle on top,straps to wear as a backpack and comes with extra strap to wear as purse. Side pockets, main pocket in back opens to inside pocket with zipper and two open pockets.Very roomy. I didn’t even notice the two different sized hidden pockets on front until my husband pointed them out. I put all my regular purse stuff in it, and a water bottle and my brush and a bag of chips and still and tonsss of room left! Smooth, waterproof material. I know because I’ve used it in the rain and snow already (not for long periods but while out shopping and long enough my other purse would have been soaked) and it stayed dry. Love it and would definitely recommend!

I am very happy with this purchase. It is a high quality, durable backpack/shoulder bag. It is multifunctional, with several pockets and very easy to clean. Most of all, I really like the anti-theft aspect. The main pocket is against your back and the front pockets have hidden zippers that would not be easy for a thief to get into. It is also really cute. I highly recommend this bag!
